greeting: Meet <1>Shioru</1>, Your Trusted Companion on Discord
greetingDescription: Enhance your Discord server with Shioru's features, including moderation, fun commands, and more.
outstandingFeaturesDescription: Born to enhance your Discord server experience with powerful tools and fun interactions.
smartCommandsDescription: Use powerful, easy-to-understand commands to make your work more efficient.
serverManagementDescription: Manage your server easily with advanced tools and features.
funInteractionsDescription: Make your server more fun with exciting and unique interactions.
musicPlayerDescription: Enjoy your favorite songs on your server with a quality music player.
powerfulCommandsDescription: Explore Shioru's wide range of commands, born to take care of your server.
cannotLoadCommands: The command is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
moreCommands: And many more commands to use! Explore them all at <1>/help</1>

messages.isComing: I'm here, I'm here, what's going on?

yourFriendInLonelyTimesDescription: Whether it's notifying people in and out, playing music, creating board games, or just being a lonely companion on days when he doesn't need them, she's always there to talk to. Whenever you miss her, just type <1>@Shioru</1> and start chatting!
shioruIsUnderCare: Because every action is under supervision, even Shioru must always be supervised.
healthMonitoringMayError: The health monitoring system may have failed and we are working hard to resolve the issue as soon as possible.
contactUsToReportProblem: If you encounter any issues, you can report them to the developer or send an email to {{email}}.
readyToInvite: Ready to make changes to your server?
inviteToJoinWithManyServer: Join thousands of servers with Shioru already on them.
aboutShioruWebsite: Shioru is a versatile Discord bot that enhances your server with management tools, fun commands, and more.
servicesGoal: Shioru's service objectives and terms and conditions.
weCareAboutYourPrivacy: We take your privacy seriously. This document explains what information we collect, how we use it, store it, and your rights to control your information.
learnMoreAboutCookiesPolicy: Learn more about the cookies we collect from Shioru and third-party cookies.
copyright: Copyrights Â© {{year}} - All rights reserved by {{name}}
weUseThirdPartyCookie: We use third-party cookies to personalize content, ads, and analyze site traffic. <1>Learn more</1>
aboutThisWebsite: Your best personal assistants will help your guild look more lively. She can do so many things that you can easily see detailed information on all commands by typing /help.
